title: RADS error (SOLVED)
body:
1. Reinstall League of legends
2. Go find C:Riot Games/League of legends
3. Double click on lol.launcher.admin
4. Wait for it to the download is finished
5. Then you can use your old way

replies.body:
Most of the time you can fix this by adjusting your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) but it's always good to have a Plan B. Thanks for pointing this out, and nice job getting yours fixed!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
